items.title: DOJ places attorney on leave after struggling in Maryland migrant case
items.description: The DOJ has placed on leave the attorney who argued on behalf of the U.S. in a lawsuit brought by a man who was deported to El Salvador in error, sour...

items.title: Huge crowds gather in 'Hands Off' rallies nationwide in protest of Trump admin
items.description: Tens of thousands of protesters mustered in cities and towns across the country on Saturday to sound off against the Trump administration.

items.title: Trump admin live updates: Admin 'covertly' froze FEMA funds, judge says
items.description: The administration's FEMA funding freeze violated a court order, a judge ruled.

items.title: WATCH:  Dashcam captures lightning strike close to traffic on Atlanta highway
items.description: A Dashcam video went viral, showing a close-call lightning strike next to a car on a highway in Atlanta.

items.title: Trump tariff formula misrepresents global trade economics, experts say
items.description: The Trump administration's tariff calculations appear on paper to be a simplified math of America's trade relationships.
